title: Up to 75% Off on the Best Travel Deals to Help You Get Away This Summer on a Budget — Including Exclusive Prime Day Savings
summary: Take advantage of up to 75% off savings on hotels, flights, rental cars, luggage and more, and finally book that vacation you've always dreamt of.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. This year’s Travel Tuesday deals and promos are making that dream vacation to far-off places or cozy staycations even more attainable. Rather than put that beachside getaway off for another month, you can take advantage of savings up to 75% off, and paired with luggage deals , you can travel the world more affordably. Prime Day 2025 is even offering exclusive savings for Prime members only until 11:59 ET/PT that you can jump on for a limited-time. Whether you’re planning on going to any festivals and concerts this summer or just want a change in environment, beaches and unexplored regions await. Summer savings events are going on now including Prime Day travel promos that’ll tempt you to take advantage of that PTO and go on a much-needed vacation. To take some of the stress out of finding the best travel deals, we did the research and rounded up the hottest deals, steals and promos so you can focus on stocking up on travel necessit…
